posts.post_title: Lowered Prices FS - 2 T209's Photo Series
posts.post_content:
I have a couple of fairly hard to acquire T209's:

McGeehan PSA 1.5 $175.00
Malcolm SGC 2.5 (super nice looking card for the grade) $235.00

Prices include shipping.  Paypal (add 3.5% for g/s), Venmo, Zelle and checks accepted.  No trades please. And thanks for looking. Dave
Hi.  Did you ever sell this card?
